title: Rock Band Dead Posey Talks 'Making It' In Music, Drinks Jack Daniel's and EH Taylor
itunes:title: Rock Band Dead Posey Talks 'Making It' In Music, Drinks Jack Daniel's and EH Taylor
description:
What happens when Fred sits down with one of rock's rising stars in Dead Posey? He busts out EH Taylor, talks about the ups and downs of music and just has a good old time. Meanwhile, Dead Posey teaches Fred a thing or two about the business. 

Listen to Dead Posey. These are Fred's picks. 

Don't Stop the Devil: https://open.spotify.com/track/7EEUIC8bIJsb17zzH32wpy

Freakshow: https://open.spotify.com/album/0Ghn8HuqlN80ewDKR7GnKN?highlight=spotify:track:7EEUIC8bIJsb17zzH32wpy

 Boogeyman: https://open.spotify.com/album/0Ghn8HuqlN80ewDKR7GnKN?highlight=spotify:track:7EEUIC8bIJsb17zzH32wpy

About Dead Posey (from their website)

IT COULD DOUBLE AS THE SOUNDTRACK FOR THE WITCHING HOUR.  A BREW OF ROUGH-AND-TUMBLE GUITARS, MELANCHOLY LYRICS, AND FEMME FATALE VOCAL INVOCATIONS, DEAD POSEY CASTED A SONIC SPELL THAT SEDUCED AS IT SCORCHED. THE LOS ANGELES-BASED BAND-VOCALIST/CO-PRODUCER DANYELL SOUZA AND PRODUCER/MULTI-INSTRUMENTALIST TONY F [FORMERLY OF EVE 6]-IMMEDIATELY ENCHANTED ON THEIR DEBUT EP "FREAK SHOW" RELEASED IN 2018.  WHILE FORMING DEAD POSEY, THE TWO TAPPED INTO AN INTENSE CREATIVE CHEMISTRY WHILE QUIETLY WORKING IN THE STUDIO FOR NEARLY A YEAR TO HONE IN ON THEIR SOUND RATHER THAN DIVING INTO THE LIVE SHOW CIRCUIT. BEYOND EARLY ACCLAIM FROM HUFFINGTON POST AND MORE ON THEIR FIRST EP THEY LANDED HIGH-PROFILE SYNCS EVERYWHERE FROM FOX'S LUCIFER, MTV'S TEEN WOLF, MARVEL'S CLOAK & DAGGER, MACY'S, SONY PLAYSTATION, AND MORE. DEAD POSEY IS CURRENTLY ANTICIPATING THE RELEASE OF THEIR SECOND EP IN SPRING 2020.

Follow Dead Posey 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadposey/ 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deadposey/

Follow Fred 

FOLLOW FRED

Bourbon Plus: https://BourbonPlus.com 

Spirits Network: https://explore.spiritsnetwork.com/fr...
